attributes.action: Nigel Farage to be knighted for 25 yr service to politics & brexit campaigning
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has campaigned his entire 25 year political career to set the uk free from the unelected bully eurocrats whilst taking horrific abuse and slander in the process only for his rhetoric to be used by the vote leave campaign. His no nonsense common sense politics has finally been repaid.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
